nodes.text: Rundil ot Sulem owned a ranch on the Outer Rim world of Dantooine. Several years before 3956 BBY, a group of Mandalorian Neo-Crusaders raided the farm and kidnapped ot Sulem's daughter, Sasha. ot Sulem hired a Twi'lek named Lur Arka Sulas to help find her, and Sulas carried out a search that lasted many years. Eventually, in 3956 BBY, Sasha was found aboard the Ebon Hawk, the ship belonging to Revan. Revan returned Sasha to Sulas, who in turn brought her back to her parents at the ranch.
